channel.title: Help me with npcs plz
channel.description:
i want to make that if npc id: 1677 die's that you get in your invetory a key id: 275
i use 317 cache with czar base
help plz :)

item.title: Help me with npcs plz
item.dc:creator: @Teh_L33t_H4x Teh L33t H4x
item.description:
@Teh_L33t_H4x wrote:

[quote=“o.O O.o, post:2, topic:278868”]Why not just make it drop the key?

Either way,

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####) { ItemHandler.addItem(key, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }[/quote]

I only have to change ####? and what is npc.type?

and if i amke it drop the key t doesnt work=[

Read full topic

Either way,
